events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume appears strong with relevant experience in backend development.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's background in software development and backend systems.
Assigned recruiter John Smith to handle this candidate's process. John has extensive experience recruiting for engineering roles.
Completed the initial screening call. The candidate demonstrated good understanding of software design principles and seemed very enthusiastic about the role.
Candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for the upcoming technical interview and expressed eagerness to proceed.
Scheduled the technical interview for May 7th at 3 PM UTC with the senior engineering team to assess coding and system design skills.
Technical interview completed successfully. The candidate showed strong problem-solving skills and a solid grasp of system architecture concepts.
HR interview has been scheduled for May 9th at 10 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies.
